data.text:
Residency

I am currently evaluating my research and sketching the script for my new video performance BODIES IN TRANSITION. In March 2020 I researched - supported by Daniela Berglehn and VISIT - in the

archive of Villa Hügel and in the Photographic Collection of the Ruhr Museum on the visual representation of bodies of industrialization and de-industrialization. I I am interested in the body images that surround and shape us - how new body images develop in the course of de-industrialization, which in turn are related to the social conditions surrounding us.
